comment: CR-017: Initial migration to QMS control

REVIEW: COMPLIANT. All criteria verified with evidence against CR-084 pre-approved scope.

FRONTMATTER:
- title: "Variance Report Template" -- present, non-empty, unchanged.
- revision_summary: "CR-084: Add integration verification guidance for code-related resolution" -- references CR-084 per SOP-002 Section 8.

CHANGES VERIFIED (per CR-084 Section 5.4):
- New "WHEN RESOLUTION INVOLVES CODE CHANGES:" block added to Resolution Work Instructions comment in Section 7 -- confirmed.
- Positioned alongside existing blocks (FOR TEST-RELATED VARIANCES, FOR CR/INV VARIANCES, FOR SIMPLE RESOLUTIONS) -- confirmed, all three existing blocks unchanged.
- Content: guidance to include integration verification, exercise fix through user-facing levers, document behavior. Cross-references SOP-002 Section 6.8 and SOP-004 Section 9A.3 -- both valid. Confirmed.

SCOPE BOUNDARY: Only the Resolution Work Instructions comment block in Section 7 was modified. Template Notice, Usage Guide, Sections 1-6, Section 7 body, and Sections 8-9 are all identical to effective v1.0.

No unintended placeholder content, typos, or formatting issues found.
